div.l: With Iohn the clerk that wakid hath al nyght
And with the fal out of her͗e slepe she breyd
Help holy Cros of bromh~olm she seyd
In manus tuas to the lord I cal
A wake Symond the fynd ys on vs fal
Myn hert is brokyn help I am but dede
Ther͗e lijth on my wombe and on myn̄ hede
Help Symkyn for the fals clerkis fight
This Iohn stert vp as sone as euyr he myght
And graspid by the wallis to and fro
To fynd a staf and she stert vp also
And knewe the estis bet than did þis Iohn
And by the wal a staf she fond a none
And saw a litil shymyryng of a light
For atta hole in shone the mone light
And by that light she sawe hem both to
But sikirly she ne wist who was who
And as she sawe a white in her͗e ye
And when she gan the white þing a spy
She wend the Clerk had werid a voluper͗e
And with the stafe she drowe ay nere and nere
And wend to have hit this Aleyn atte ful
And smote the myller on the pillid skul
And doun̄ he goith and crijd harowe I dy
These Clerkis bete him wele and lete him ly
And graythed hem and toke her͗e korn̄ a none
And eke her͗e mele and on her͗e wey they gone
And atte myl dor yit they toke her kake
Of half a busshel flour͗e wele I bake
Thus is the prowd myller͗e wel I bete
And hath I lost the gryndyng of his whete
And paid for the sowper͗e euerydele
Of Aleyn and Iohn that bete him wele
His wyfe is swywid and þe doghter als
Lo such it is a myller for to be fals
And ther͗e for this proverbe is ful soth
Him thar͗e nat wene wele that ewil doith
A gyler͗e shal e vir͗e e vir͗e evir͗e begylid be
